sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-dialog v-model="internalDialog" max-width="600px">
      <v-card>
        <v-card-title>{{ dialogTitle }}</v-card-title>
        <v-card-text>
          <v-form ref="form">
            <v-text-field v-model="editedItemCopy.num" :rules="[rules.counter, rules.numIfNonEmpty]"
              label="№ Заявки" required></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field v-model="editedItemCopy.stg" :rules="[rules.stgCheck, rules.max20Characters]" 
              label="Продукт" required></v-text-field>
            <v-row>
              <v-col cols="12" sm="6" md="4">
                <v-menu v-model="menu2" :close-on-content-click="false" :nudge-right="40" transition="scale-transition"
                  offset-y min-width="auto">
                  <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
                    <v-text-field v-model="editedItemCopy.dadd" label="Дата" prepend-icon="mdi-calendar" readonly
                      v-bind="attrs" v-on="on"></v-text-field>
                  </template>
                  <v-date-picker v-model="editedItemCopy.dadd" @input="menu2 = false"></v-date-picker>
                </v-menu>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
            <v-text-field v-model="editedItemCopy.client_name" :rules="[rules.client_nameCheck]" 
               label="Клиент" required></v-text-field>
            <v-row>
              <v-col class="d-flex" cols="12" sm="6">
                <v-select v-model="editedItemCopy.state" :items="statusOptions" label="Статус"></v-select>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
            <v-text-field v-model="editedItemCopy.person_phone" :rules="[rules.personPhoneCheck]" 
              label="Телефон" required></v-text-field>
          </v-form>
        </v-card-text>
        <v-card-actions>
          <v-spacer></v-spacer>
          <v-btn color="blue darken-1" text @click="closeDialog">Отмена</v-btn>
          <v-btn color="blue darken-1" text @click="saveItem">Сохранить</v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
      </v-card>
    </v-dialog>
  </template>
  

<script>

export default {
    props: {
        dialog: Boolean,
        dialogTitle: String,
        editedItem: Object,
        rules: Object,
        statusOptions: Array
    },
    data() {
    return {
      internalDialog: this.dialog,
      editedItemCopy: Object.assign({}, this.editedItem),
      menu2: false 
    };
  },
  methods: {
    closeDialog() {
      this.internalDialog = false;
      this.$emit('update:dialog', this.internalDialog);
    },
    saveItem() {
      this.$emit('save', this.editedItemCopy);
    }
  },
  watch: {
    editedItem(newVal) {
      this.editedItemCopy = Object.assign({}, newVal);
    },
    dialog(newVal) {
      this.internalDialog = newVal;
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
/* Стили для диалогового окна, если необходимо */
</style>
